text: Irfan Handžić (born 1 October 1956) is a retired Bosnian professional football Goalkeeper and manager. He spent the majority of his playing career with Sarajevo, before transferring to the Turkish Süper Lig. As a manager, he worked in Turkey, Kuwait and his native Bosnia. He was most recently the goalkeeping coach of Sarajevo. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Sarajevo Category:Bosniaks of Bosnia and Herzegovina Category:Yugoslav footballers Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina footballers Category:Yugoslav expatriate footballers Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Turkey Category:Yugoslav First League players Category:Süper Lig players Category:FK Sarajevo players Category:Adana Demirspor footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina football managers Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina expatriate football managers Category:Expatriate football managers in Turkey Category:Expatriate football managers in Kuwait Category:Premier League of Bosnia and Herzegovina managers Category:NK Čelik Zenica managers
title: Irfan Handžić
